tool_description: Verifies and corrects name and subject headings against established authority files including LCNAF, LCSH, VIAF, and institutional authority databases.

headings_to_check.description: Array of name or subject headings to verify against authorities

authority_files.description: Authority files to check: LCNAF, LCSH, VIAF, local

auto_correct.description: Whether to automatically apply corrections for close matches

match_threshold.description: Minimum similarity score for suggesting matches (0.1-1.0)

error_messages: No headings provided: Supply at least one heading to check against authorities
Invalid authority file: Use LCNAF, LCSH, VIAF, or local
Authority service unavailable: Unable to connect to authority database
Invalid match threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Malformed heading format: Check heading syntax and punctuation
usage: Provide headings_to_check array with names or subjects to verify. Select authority_files to search, enable auto_correct for automatic fixes, and set match_threshold for suggestion sensitivity.

verified_headings.description: Array of headings that match authority records exactly

corrected_headings.description: Array of headings with applied corrections

suggested_corrections.description: Array of suggested corrections for unverified headings

authority_numbers.description: Array of authority record control numbers for verified headings

unverified_headings.description: Array of headings not found in any authority file
